articles.description: Motorola launched one of the most affordable 5G phones you can buy in Europe. For those in the US, the company promises a sub-$500 budget 5G phone this fall.
articles.content:
Motorola combines its expertise in affordable phones with its knowledge of 5G to create the Moto G 5G Plus.
Motorola
There's one quality nearly all 5G phones have in common: They're expensive. It w… [+6472 chars]

articles.author: Chaim Gartenberg
articles.title: Intel’s Thunderbolt 4 standard looks to raise the bar for USB-C devices - Circuit Breaker
articles.description: Intel has announced details for its upcoming Thunderbolt 4 specification for USB-C, which offers the same 40Gbps speeds but looks to raise the minimum support for data transfer and displays to surpass both Thunderbolt 3 and the upcoming USB4 standard.
articles.content:
Filed under:
USB4 is already getting surpassed
